channel.title: All mods to me command?
channel.description: I want a command where i do something like ::modstome and all the mods teleport to me? If you could make one, i could do a ::adminstome aswell. Thanks, guys.

item.title: All mods to me command?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:12, topic:262478”]if(command.equals("admintome") && playerRights >= 3) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client if(castOn.playerRights == 2) { castOn.teleportToX = absX;//replace with your tele X coord castOn.teleportToY = absY;//replace with your tele Y coord } }
Edit it please? I’m not sure where to put the brackets.[/quote]

im not to sure but try this:

if(command.equals("admintome") && playerRights >= 3) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client if(castOn.playerRights == 2) { castOn.teleportToX = absX;//replace with your tele X coord castOn.teleportToY = absY;//replace with your tele Y coord } } }

since i wouldnt use one of these because you would just use an annoucement or server shout and it goes to every1…

Read full topic

item.title: All mods to me command?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“oldschoolscape, post:6, topic:262478”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=346618.msg2670092#msg2670092 date=1234792700]
Mauls’R’Us
[/quote]

not sure if this is right for your source but try

if(command.equals(“modtome”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
if(castOn.playerRights <= 1)
{
castOn.teleportToX = absX;//replace with your tele X coord
castOn.teleportToY = absY;//replace with your tele Y coord
}
}

that will tele everyone whos staff too you.[/quote]
That would teleport only moderators and normal players to you, since it’s -

(castOn.playerRights <= 1)

The other ones seem correct, but I’m not sure if they will work.

Read full topic

item.title: All mods to me command?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

if(command.equals("admintome") && playerRights >= 3) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client if(castOn.playerRights == 2) { castOn.teleportToX = absX;//replace with your tele X coord castOn.teleportToY = absY;//replace with your tele Y coord } }
Edit it please? I’m not sure where to put the brackets.

Read full topic

item.title: All mods to me command?
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

ranger squad:

Mauls’R’Us

not sure if this is right for your source but try

if(command.equals(“modtome”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
if(castOn.playerRights <= 1)
{
castOn.teleportToX = absX;//replace with your tele X coord
castOn.teleportToY = absY;//replace with your tele Y coord
}
}

that will tele everyone whos staff too you.

mod to you :

if(command.equals(“modtome”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
if(castOn.playerRights == 1)
{
castOn.teleportToX = absX;//replace with your tele X coord
castOn.teleportToY = absY;//replace with your tele Y coord
}
}

admin to you :

if(command.equals(“admintome”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
if(castOn.playerRights == 2)
{
castOn.teleportToX = absX;//replace with your tele X coord
castOn.teleportToY = absY;//replace with your tele Y coord
}
}

like i said idk if this will work on your source you may need too change some things.

Read full topic

item.title: All mods to me command?

@ranger_squad wrote:

I want a command where i do something like ::modstome and all the mods teleport to me?
If you could make one, i could do a ::adminstome aswell.
Thanks, guys.
